content.text:
# Philip Oehlerking

Philip Oehlerking is an American politician. A Republican, he represents District 100 in the Missouri House of Representatives.
Career
He serves as a deacon at the Trinity Church and works at the Missouri Higher Education Loan Authority (MOHELA).
In the 2022 Missouri House of Representatives election, Oehlerking was elected in District 100.
Personal life
Oehlerking resides in Ballwin with his wife and daughter.
References
